abalado_descricao: The character suffers –2 to skill checks. If you become shaken again, instead you get terrified. Fear condition.
agarrado_descricao: The character is off guard and immobile, suffers –2 to attack checks and can only attack with light weapons. A character making a ranged attack against a target involved in the grapple maneuver grapple has a 50% chance to hit the wrong target. Paralysis condition
alquebrado_descricao: The mana cost of the character's abilities and spells increases by +1. Mental condition.
apavorado_descricao: The character suffers –5 on skill checks and cannot voluntarily approach the source of fear. Fear condition.
atordoado_descricao: The character is off guard and can’t perform actions. Mental condition
caido_descricao: Lying on the floor. The character suffers –5 to melee attacks and their speed is reduced to 5ft. In addition, they suffer –5 Defense against melee attacks, but gain +5 Defense against ranged attacks.
cego_descricao: The character is off guard and slow, cannot make Perception checks to observe and suffers –5 to Strength-based or Dexterity-based skill checks. All targets of their attacks receive total camouflage. Senses condition.
confuso_descricao: The character behaves randomly. Roll 1d6 at the start of their turns: 1) Move in a direction chosen by a roll of 1d8; 2-3) Cannot do actions, except reactions, and babble incoherently; 4-5) Use the weapon they are wielding to attack the nearest creature, or themselves if they are alone (in this case, just roll damage); 6) Condition ends and can act normally. Mental condition.
debilitado_descricao: The character suffers –5 on physical attribute (Strength, Dexterity and Constitution) checks and skill checks based on those attributes. If the character become debilitated again, they instead become unconscious.
desprevenido_descricao: O personagem sofre –5 na Defesa e em Reflexos. Você fica desprevenido contra inimigos que não possa perceber.
doente_descricao: Under the effects of a disease.
emchamas_descricao: The character is on fire. At the start of their turns, they take 1d6 points of fire damage. The character can spend a standard action to put out the fire with their hands. Immersion in water also puts out the flames.
enfeiticado_descricao: The character becomes helpful towards the source of the condition. He does not come under the source's control, but perceives his words and actions in the most favorable light. The source of the condition gains +10 on Diplomacy checks with the character. Mental Condition.
enjoado_descricao: The character can only make a standard or move action (not both) per round. They can spend a standard action to charge, but can advance only as much as their Speed (not double). Metabolic condition.
enreado_descricao: The character becomes slow, vulnerable and suffers –2 to attack rolls. Paralysis condition.
envenenado_descricao: The effect of this condition varies according to the poison. It could be another condition (e.g. weak or nauseated) or recurring damage (for example, 1d12 points of damage per round). The poison description determines its duration (if nothing is said, the condition lasts for the scene).
esmorecido_descricao: The character suffers –5 to mental attribute (Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma) checks  and skills based on those attributes. Mental condition.
exausto_descricao: The character is debilitated, slowed, and vulnerable. If they become exhausted again, instead they become unconscious. Fatigue condition.
fascinado_descricao: Com a atenção presa em alguma coisa. O personagem sofre –5 em Percepção e não pode fazer ações, exceto observar aquilo que o fascinou. Esta condição é anulada por ações hostis contra o personagem ou se o que o fascinou não estiver mais visível. Balançar uma criatura fascinada para tirá-la desse estado gasta uma ação padrão. Mental.
fatigado_descricao: The character becomes weak and vulnerable. If the character becomes fatigued again, instead they become exhausted. Fatigue condition.
fraco_descricao: The character suffers –2 to physical attribute (Strength, Dexterity and Constitution) checks and skills based on those attributes. If they become weak again, they become debilitated instead.
frustrado_descricao: The character suffers –2 to mental attribute (Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma) checks and skills based on those attributes. If they become frustrated again, they become dismayed instead. Mental condition.
imovel_descricao: All forms of speed are reduced to 0ft. Paralysis condition.
inconsciente_descricao: The character is helpless and cannot do actions. Shaking a creature to wake them up costs a standard action.
indefeso_descricao: The character is considered off guard, but suffers –10 to Defense, automatically fails Reflexes saves and can be targeted by deathblows.
lento_descricao: All speed forms are halved (round down to the closest 5ft increment) and can’t run or charge. Paralysis condition.
ofuscado_descricao: The character suffers –2 to attack checks and Perception. Senses condition.
paralizado_descricao: The character is immobile and helpless and can only perform purely mental actions. Paralysis condition.
pasmo_descricao: The character cannot take actions, except for reactions. Mental condition.
petrificacao_descricao: The character becomes unconscious and gains damage resistance 8. Metamorphosis Condition.
sangrando_descricao: With an open wound. At the start of their turns, the character must make a Constitution check (DC 15). If they pass, they stabilize and remove this condition. If they fail, they suffer 1d6 damage and continue to bleed. Metabolic Condition.
surdo_descricao: The character cannot make Perception checks to hear and suffers –5 to Initiative checks. In addition, they are considered to be in poor condition for casting spells. Senses condition.
surpreendido_descricao: Unaware of their enemies. The character is off guard and cannot take actions, except reactions.
shovedefense: -5 in Defense against Melee attacks. +5 Defense against Ranged attacks.
court_rica_sub_desc: Fornece três conselheiros e uma ação de domínio extra por turno
court_odiado_desc: -5 em ações de domínio e pode sofrer uma revolta
